author: giffels
body:
Hi Alan, Diego,

Stefano and Federica found today two problems with the current DBS 3 service. One is in the Lexicon.py for the input validation and one in the migration service. Both are triggered only by certain dataset/block pattern. Both can cause failures when CRAB 2 is publishing into DBS 3.

Could you deploy the DBS hot fix version 3.2.1a, which contain only those two changes, please?

Sorry for the inconvenience.

Thanks,
Yuyi & Manuel
title: comp.pre slc5_amd64_gcc461 dbs3 dbs3-client dbs3-migration dbs3-pycurl-client
